Class MusicPlayer

java.lang.Object
sounds.MusicPlayer
public class MusicPlayer extends Object
The MusicPlayer class is a singleton utility for managing background music and sound effects in a game or application. It supports playback, stopping, looping, and volume adjustment of audio clips.

  • Field Details

    • instance

      private static MusicPlayer instance
      Singleton instance of the MusicPlayer. Ensures that only one instance of the MusicPlayer exists at any given time. Used to manage and control background music across the application.

    • clip

      private Clip clip
      Represents the audio clip for playing sound or music. This variable holds the audio data and provides methods to control playback such as start, stop, and loop.

    • volumeControl

      private FloatControl volumeControl
      Represents the volume control for the audio system. This variable provides the ability to adjust the volume of audio playback using FloatControl.

  • Constructor Details

    • MusicPlayer

      private MusicPlayer(String resourcePath)
      Private constructor to initialize the MusicPlayer with the specified audio file.
      Parameters:
      resourcePath - the path to the audio resource to be played.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MusicPlayer getInstance(String resourcePath)
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the MusicPlayer, initializing it if necessary.
      Parameters:
      resourcePath - the path to the audio resource to be played.
      Returns:
      the singleton MusicPlayer instance.

    • play

      public void play()
      Starts playing the audio clip in a continuous loop.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the audio playback and resets the clip to the beginning.

    • setVolume

      public void setVolume(float volume)
      Sets the playback volume for the audio clip.
      Parameters:
      volume - a value between 0.0 (minimum volume) and 1.0 (maximum volume).

    • playEffect

      public static void playEffect(String resourcePath, float volume)
      Plays a one-time sound effect with the specified volume.
      Parameters:
      resourcePath - the path to the audio resource to be played.
      volume - a value between 0.0 (minimum volume) and 1.0 (maximum volume).
